item.description:
Come out and see Boston's premier funk and soul revival band, the Chicken Slacks, get everyone movin' and groovin' at Johnny D's, located at 17 Holland St, Somerville, MA 02144.

Johhny D's Uptown Restaurant & Music Club

Johnny D's serves dinner until 9:30 p.m. and accepts dinner reservations. Visit Johnny D's website for details on making reservations and ensuring a seat for the show. Note that even with dinner reservations there is a cash cover charge; $10.00 for this show.

Also see Johnny D's Directions page for directions, including a link to a city parking map.

The Chicken Slacks

From the Chicken Slacks MySpace page:

If you could describe The Chicken Slacks in one word, it would be: Party.

Boston's hardest-working soul band delivers a "one-two-three-four!" punch that will inevitably move you to shake it. Ain't nothin' but a party, and y'all are invited. Put that beat in your feet, fill that hole in your soul.

Over the past seven years, The Chicken Slacks have developed a reputation as one of the funnest and funkiest club and private party acts in town. A skin-tight rhythm section (dubbed the "Engine Room"), gritty horns ("The Chicken Slacks Brass Attack"), and a stirring star vocalist ("Diamond D") combine to create a powerful stage presence and big sound.

The Chicken Slacks play every Thursday night at The Cantab in Central Square, Cambridge, but this is a great chance to see them on a weekend and cut loose on the dance floor ... without worrying about Thinking at work the next day.

I realize this is late notice but I really wanted to let everyone know about this great opportunity to see The Chicken Slacks and do some dancing. Hope to see you there!

Please feel free to email me if you any questions about the show.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Beer Advocate knit cap
item.name: Chicken Slacks @ Johnny D's Uptown Restaurant & Music Club
